repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
The first of three bundles containing trading records dated between 1826 and 18**:
Bundle 1: April 1826 to March 1830 (BnF Indien 439).
Bundle 2: *** (BnF Indien 440).
Bundle 3: *** (BnF Indien 441).

This bundle 1 contains 26 items as follows:
Item 1 (4 folios, foliated {1}-4): April 1, 1826 and June 5, 1826.
Item 2 (7 folios, foliated {1}-7): March 4, 1827.
...
Item 26 (1 folio, unfoliated): March 1830.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark on the recto.
38 folios = Trading records (1 of 3). Tamil foliation.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 439 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker: DON N° (front cover, recto).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: Dated to 1827-1828 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, Département des Manuscrits, Inventaire 7 = dons : manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, n° 1 à 3306: no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 62, no. 439.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 100r, no. 407 439.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.

body.ab:

civamayaM
moracu ApiṟāMa cāmiṉātuṭaiyāruk=ku
Eḻuti y-aṉuppi vait=ta kākit=tatuk=ku
cavvātu ‧ 1826 Avuṟil
IppavuM tammuṭaiya pēruk=ku muṉṉāl nāṉ aṉuppi
